title: Pikotarou no Lullaby Lullaby (TV)
synopsis: Piko-tarou will improvise the story of each three-minute episode using an illustration by the anime's director Takashi Taniguchi. He will tell each story in the style of a fairy tale and voice every character, including himself.
staff: [['Hosoya, Nobuyuki', ['Producer']], ['Taniguchi, Takashi', ['Director', ' Character Design']], ['Kosaka, Daimaou', ['Music', ' Planning']], ['Yamakawa, Norio', ['Associate Producer']]]
